### Get pdf's sha3-256 hash

```
$$$ cat /proj/docs/PLS-challenge0-9-1.pdf | openssl dgst -sha3-256
(stdin)= 5e44a3c32b2ca745bdb8f39965b421a838b3eea9ed44625b439d4f091b7ba059
```

### Get transaction data with OP_RETURN

```
$$$ bitcoin-cli -regtest getrawtransaction 68f60d55b1493a1b14b55ec8ff9cbf96ee834e6aaec70fc70dbfd6b1310fd5da true
{
  "txid": "68f60d55b1493a1b14b55ec8ff9cbf96ee834e6aaec70fc70dbfd6b1310fd5da",
  "hash": "2b29e6fb07d282c0b0e2ad77bbe11a43335b38f491b384a44cf7c7decc8e7a69",
  "version": 2,
  "size": 641,
  "vsize": 311,
  "weight": 1244,
  "locktime": 0,
  "vin": [
    {
      "txid": "da49ed24944a792b7500be9dc54037b5cd03cf2eb85fcaabf21de031fab298b9",
      "vout": 0,
      "scriptSig": {
        "asm": "",
        "hex": ""
      },
      "txinwitness": [
        "",
        "3045022100a14d62d6a955c303a1b2d87a82b429ddce863a50152df977e11dc245ad79e81202203c14b23196fe9a16e87c674801aec30befbda15ef7f06ad4b6df34a73b3e7fd201",
        "3045022100b757b5c01b5b1e4276f0a5c027eb42c89ba7f99f918537a974372cea4ef5352502202baba073354b0891f3a5166c1f0d2e87e6c6bdf7225b3c950d1c01e687a5292f01",
        "522102ab0fe557d8aabf367ff0e5af9078d72712ad2f73f0a2b2224dce7ee53b13834b210362abb05ed3748da977ef648833329fb0cf10bc452e2eae377fe9e6b4a6a0a87a52ae"
      ],
      "sequence": 4294967295
    },
    {
      "txid": "f6eea771d31e87ab6c172446350a203b08058f790c1f595713e9b1199228555a",
      "vout": 0,
      "scriptSig": {
        "asm": "",
        "hex": ""
      },
      "txinwitness": [
        "",
        "304402201d034c664b9050955b35ac77976737776102278934299d2e5a3c26e72903aef502203ff91956e6d54766b3b102fbf48f7ddbc7e8055020a265d2736d6ce038acb49801",
        "304402203195f3dcf4bcd478bb80ef7e8b3e0be7ed8dfc42d12e094593770df53020a132022010fe2e7a99d5fa687fe19839af49c8011af930dda2569cb5ca94ba2ad715882001",
        "522102ab0fe557d8aabf367ff0e5af9078d72712ad2f73f0a2b2224dce7ee53b13834b210362abb05ed3748da977ef648833329fb0cf10bc452e2eae377fe9e6b4a6a0a87a52ae"
      ],
      "sequence": 4294967295
    }
  ],
  "vout": [
    {
      "value": 0.00035000,
      "n": 0,
      "scriptPubKey": {
        "asm": "0 f08bdbaf4444eb47b898d0915091a9bab55db383",
        "hex": "0014f08bdbaf4444eb47b898d0915091a9bab55db383",
        "address": "bcrt1q7z9aht6ygn450wyc6zg4pydfh264mvuragrmya",
        "type": "witness_v0_keyhash"
      }
    },
    {
      "value": 0.00000000,
      "n": 1,
      "scriptPubKey": {
        "asm": "OP_RETURN 504c5335653434613363333262326361373435626462386633393936356234323161383338623365656139656434343632356234333964346630393162376261303539",
        "hex": "6a43504c5335653434613363333262326361373435626462386633393936356234323161383338623365656139656434343632356234333964346630393162376261303539",
        "type": "nulldata"
      }
    }
  ],
  "hex": ""
}
```

### Decodes OP_RETURN data from hex (PLS + pdf's hash)

```
$$$ echo 504c5335653434613363333262326361373435626462386633393936356234323161383338623365656139656434343632356234333964346630393162376261303539 | xxd -r -p
PLS5e44a3c32b2ca745bdb8f39965b421a838b3eea9ed44625b439d4f091b7ba059
```
